name: Pinkman Day 1
description:
INKJAM 2018 SUBMISSION:

Welcome to Bermuda Oregon, a small costal fishing town, where you have gone to work on your next novel. Explore several locations and dialogue trees, uncover the mysteries that may be hiding. Return a book to the library.

Made over a weekend using Unity with Ink integration.  More of a demo or pre-alpha of an idea - the game has no proper ending and simply allows you to replay different paths through the same day groundhog day style.

If you like it please let me know - I'm interested in continuing the story!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys: Move left/right, Select Dialogue up/down

Spacebar / Return: Select Dialogue
